p: Compounds showing promising antiproliferative as well as kinase inhibitory activity 5d, 5e and 5f were further investigated for their influence on the cell cycle progression by flow cytometry analysis using propidium iodide (PI) stain. Cell cycle parameters were compared for the breast cancer MCF-7 cells with DMSO as control and after treatment with the compounds of interest and incubation for 24â€‰h, and the results were presented in Figure 5 and Table 3.
